column1: #Text=Their spirits are trapped in the Spirit World .
#Text=" Mako says : " Let 's get them out .
#Text=Maybe if I meditate into the Spirit World , I can free them .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait ... this is n't the Spirit World .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " You ca n't fight me and the poison !
#Text=" Korra says : " No ... I got it out !
#Text=" Zaheer says : " You 'll never get it out !
#Text=" Mako says : " What are you talking about ?
#Text=" Korra says : " He 's been haunting me ever since I fought him .
#Text=It 's like he 's blocking me from meditating into the Spirit World .
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm here for you .
